name: Space Survivors
description:
Space is a dangerous place, survive as long as possible, collect the hearts, but be warned theirs's a side effect of collecting the hearts... 

surviving 1 minute is an accomplishment  

Not sure if the song loops, didn't have the chance to add animations and sound effect, the walls are cheating btw couldn't get them working not sure why, I used Godot so let me know what I did wrong please.
